name: Mister Lincoln
description: A very well-known hybrid tea. Long-pointed buds open into large, well-formed, long stemmed, fully double, blooms of deep red.

name: Golden Celebration
description: These magnificent flowers are held on a very good repeat blooming shrub of ideal rounded habit of growth. The foliage is a dark glossy green that shows them off to perfection. Makes a good hedge.

name: Sugar Moon
description: Clean white full blooms with a strong citrus fragrance has pointed buds. Tall, bushy, upright. Large, glossy, dark green foliage.

name: Oranges 'n' Lemons
description: Medium to large  are fully double and produced in clusters, having a mild fruity fragrance.

name: Thérèse Bugnet
description: With the beauty of a Damask this rose has wonderful repeat blooming, old-fashioned ruffled blooms of lilac pink plus a slight spicy fragrance produced on almost thornless canes.

name: Compassion®
description: A profuse continual blooming climber that should find a spot in every garden. The marvelous honey/peach fragrance of 'Compassion' has earned it the RNRS winner of Edland Medal for fragrance. Makes a good cut flower.

name: Molineux®
description: Exceptional freedom of bloom and a wonderful fruity fragrance. 'Molineux' is one of the more compact growing of Austin's roses and should be most useful in smaller gardens. A bushy plant that will bloom continually.

name: Hot Cocoa
description: Hot Cocoa™ displays an unusual coloring of a smoky, chocolate-orange which stays vibrant over time and beautifully contrasts her glossy, dark-green foliage.

name: CL Iceberg
description: The continual blooming sport of the outstanding Floribunda, `Iceberg'. In the spring it is covered with clouds of pure white, semi-double blooms exuding a honey fragrance. 20-25 petals.

name: America™
description: America is a climbing rose with dark green leathery leaves lovely salmon-pink with lighter reverse fully double blooms

name: Purple Tiger
description: Prepare to be stunned by the unique splash of Purple Tiger. Each unique bloom and petal seems to explode in a colorful rhythm of slashes, dashes, streaks, and dots run amok. A citrus-sweet perfume is an added bonus to this one of a kind specimen.

name: Rock & Roll™
description: A flashy climber that is striped and splashed burgundy, red & white. Strong, fruity, rose fragrance. Medium-large, very full blooms. This garden cast member will play the lead role.
